Index: Start Here

An introduction to this blog, and a list of all my posts.

January 1, 2020 - 1 minute read -

Here is a list of all of my posts.

I cover the basics of using R for data science, based loosely on the book R for Data Science by Garrett Grolemund and Hadley Wickham:

  • February 12, 2020: Basic Data Visualization in R
  • February 15, 2020: Basic Data Transformation in R
  • February 16, 2020: Basic Data Exploration in R
  • February 17, 2020: High-Level Data Wrangling in R: Imports, Pivots, and Joins
  • February 18, 2020: Data Wrangling in R: Strings
  • February 21, 2020: Data Wrangling in R: Factors
